releaseNotes:
Release v0.1.17

New Features:
- Add PostgreSQL Query, Execute, RawExecute actions (PS-90)
- Add MySQL Query, Execute, RawExecute actions (PS-90)
- Add MongoDB Find, Write, Aggregate actions (PS-90)
- Add Supabase Query, Execute actions (PS-90)
- Add S3 Upload, Download, Delete, List actions (PS-91)
- Add GCS Upload, Download, Delete, List actions (PS-91)
- Add Azure Blob Upload, Download, Delete, List actions (PS-91)
- Add retry config UI to right sidebar with license gating

Bug Fixes:
- Fix MySQL TLS â€” add require_tls to prevent plaintext connections (PS-90)
- Cap retry_delay_ms to prevent indefinite workflow hang
- Surface retry config save errors in frontend
- Validate retry_backoff_multiplier >= 1.0
- Fix 24 failing tests in succession_actions crate (PS-67)

Improvements:
- Added icons for new action nodes
- Match retry locked state to premium gold star visual identity
